name: OpenLantern-TechnologyManagementPlatform
0:
”Alexa, load Martech”
”Alexa, open Martech”
”Alexa, start Martech”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: martech
des:
This skill helps users to query our Marketing Technology vendors to understand their capabilities. Ask Open Lantern for information about Martech categories and vendors. 

Just say, "Alexa, open Martech" to load the skill. Once the skill has been loaded, you can ask about individual categories and their vendors.

To get a list of Martech vendors in a particular category say "Tell me about <insert your Martech category name>". Example: "Tell me about Chat" or "Tell me about Analytics"

If a category you selected is available, you will get a list of individual vendors. 

Examples of our chat vendors are : Liveperson, Livechat, Com100, Velaro and Bold360 
To hear information about these vendors, you can say "What is Liveperson?" or "What is Com100?" 

Examples of our analytics vendors are : Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, IBM, and Webtrends 
To hear information about these vendors, you can say "Tell me about IBM" or "Tell me about Webtrends"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
